_header: High towers by strong winds full low be cast

CULGg412.Transcription:
Heigh towers by strong wyndes full lowe be castWhen the lower cotages
                    stand sure & fastTherfor with surenes yt is better in povertie
                    tabidethen hastily to be Riche and sodaynly to slyde
CULGg412.Editions:
Hingeston,  Francis Charles,
                        ed.  
             Johannis Capgrave liber de illustribus Henricis.
Rolls Series
         7 (1858; repr. Kraus, 1970): xxvi.
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 53.
